Class EditRowView

java.lang.Object
main.AbstractView
main.EditRowView
public class EditRowView extends AbstractView
Represents a view for editing a specific cell value in a table. The EditRowView is associated with an underlying RowsView.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs an EditRowView object.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditRowView

      public EditRowView(TablrManager mgr, LayoutInfo layoutInfo, ViewList viewList, RowsView underlyingMode, UUID tableId, String nameColumn, Integer rowIndex)
      Constructs an EditRowView object.
      Parameters:
      mgr - the TablrManager instance responsible for managing the table data
      underlyingMode - the underlying RowsView used to provide the basis of this view
      tableId - the UUID of the table containing the cell being edited
      nameColumn - the name of the column containing the cell being edited
      rowIndex - the index of the row containing the cell being edited

  • Method Details

    • handleDoubleClick

      public void handleDoubleClick(int x, int y)
      Handles a double-click event at the specified coordinates. no action is performed.
      Specified by:
      handleDoubleClick in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate where the double-click occurred.
      y - The y-coordinate where the double-click occurred.

      public void handleSingleClick(int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate where the single-click occurred.
      y - The y-coordinate where the single-click occurred.

      public void handleCtrlEnter()

      public void handleEnter()

      reverts to rowsView.

      Specified by:

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete()
      Handles the delete action in the editing view of a cell. Does nothing.
      Specified by:
      handleDelete in class AbstractView

    • handleCharTyped

      public void handleCharTyped(char keyChar)
      Handles the typing of a single character into the editing view of a cell. The character is appended to the current cell's value, and the cell is updated with the new value.
      Specified by:
      handleCharTyped in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      keyChar - The character that was typed.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of the editing view which reflects the cell currently being edited.
      Specified by:
      getTitle in class AbstractView
      Returns:
      A string representing the title in the format: "Editing value of [columnName] at row [rowIndex]".

    • paint

      public void paint(Graphics g)
      Paints the view through the RowsView object.
      Overrides:
      paint in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object used to perform the rendering.

    • handleDeadView

      public boolean handleDeadView(AbstractView view)
      this method is invoked if underlyingView is killed and should be disposed. Returns true
      Overrides:
      handleDeadView in class AbstractView
      Parameters:
      view - that is to be disposed
      Returns:
      True if this object is to be disposed also
